item.title: ffmpeg_scripts
item.description: using ffmpeg. I use ffmpeg to convert videos from one format to the other. In order to create small video files from gifs I use this script: #!/usr/bin/sh # two-pass video-conversion with resizing to width echo "$1>> $2resizing to width=$3with target video-bitrate of $4" ffmpeg -y -i "$1" -vf scale=$3:-1 -c:v vp9 -preset quality -b:v $4 -pass 1 -an -auto-alt-ref 0 -f webm /dev/null && \ ffmpeg -i "$1" -vf scale=$3:-1 -c:v vp9 -preset quality -b:v $4 -pass 2 -an -auto-alt-ref 0 $2 explanation -an (no audio) -vf (video filtering -> see below) -c:v (video codec options - e.
